contentPage.title: New LEGO® Sets and Toys

textBlocks.title: New LEGO® Sets and Toys
textBlocks.text: Calling all LEGO® fans! If you love having the latest sets to build, save this page. Here you can find every new LEGO set we've released in the last 2 months. From building toy to complex collectibles, there is a wide range to discover. Browse a vast LEGO assortment and filter by age, price, interest and more. You can also find all the sets coming soon, LEGO Exclusives and the most popular LEGO sets here!

articles.title: New LEGO® City Sets for 2024
articles.description: Explore the latest LEGO® City sets for 2024. Imagine, build, and play with the newest additions to the collection.

articles.title: New Building Toys in 2024
articles.description: Discover our exciting lineup of new LEGO® building toys for 2024. Find the perfect set for every builder, big or small, and unlock a world of creative play!
